Stronger tool for e2e testing

Usage:
  chainsaw [flags]
  chainsaw [command]

Available Commands:
  build       Build commands
  completion  Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
  create      Create Chainsaw resources
  docs        Generate reference documentation
  export      Export commands
  help        Help about any command
  migrate     Migrate resources to Chainsaw
  test        Run tests
  version     Print the version informations

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for chainsaw

Use "chainsaw [command] --help" for more information about a command.
